artist: Designer: Johan Rohde; Maker: Georg Jensen, Copenhagen, Denmark
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: Handwrought sterling silver with carved ivory handle
markings: \'DESSIN\', manufacturer\'s mark, \'925.S / DENMARK / GEORGE JENSEN\', monogram, \' STERLING / 4B5\' on bottom
text: The use of ivory in handles of silver vessels and containers as an insulator against heat is several centuries old, but Johan Rohde integrated this material into a very modernist, twentieth-century Scandinavian design.
title: Pitcher
